y'eby'eitaka I-ORG
eine O
obushoboorozi O

, O

ba O

Abazaire O

gw'eby'esente I-DATE
, O

James B-PER

The O

limits O

wa O

mu O

n'abammyuka O

Museveni B-PER
kino O

kiyinza O

State B-ORG

mu O
2011 B-DATE
. O

Critics O

on O

but O
